channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines

item.title: Al Jazeera journalist Anas al-Sharif and 4 team members killed in Gaza
item.description: Israel's military targeted and killed five Al Jazeera journalists in Gaza on Sunday, including Al Jazeera correspondent Anas al-Sharif.
